name: Text + chips
description: A layout that displays key topics or keywords as interactive 'chips' associated with a body of text. This helps users quickly grasp the context and allows them to easily filter, select, or explore related items.
examples: Show me the main topics from my recent messages.
Tell me about my running performance, filtered by day of the week.
Categorize my expenses for last month.

component_title.description: A brief title for the entire content block.

chip_list.description: An array of interactive chips that represent keywords, topics, or filters related to the text content.

chip.description: The text label for the chip.

disable.description: Determines if the chip is interactive. `true` for disabled (not clickable), `false` for enabled.

text_subheading.description: A subheading or short summary for the main text content.

text_description.description: The main body of text content that is associated with the chips.
text_description.example: The company entered digital health with new AI tools to support faster diagnostics and better patient care.

sample.text_description: The company entered digital health with new AI tools to support faster diagnostics and better patient care.

html:
{{ data.component_title }}

{{ item.chip }}

{{ data.text_subheading }}

{{ data.text_description }}
